BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
 
 
 Ray version: 1.0.1.post1
 python: 3.7.5
 OS: Linux version 4.14.81.bm.23-amd64
 
 AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'optimizer'
 <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
 
 from ray.tune.suggest.skopt import SkOptSearch
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38720272/102588520-833a0300-4148-11eb-98b8-72864d59ab40.png></denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text: Thanks for the report! The fix is to install pip install scikit-optimize.

comments_1.comment_text: I've opened a PR to fix this error message

comments_2.comment_text:
Thanks for the report! The fix is to install pip install scikit-optimize.
 
 Thanks.
 The problem has been solved.
